belongs_to_collection.name: La notte dei trailer viventi - collection

response.overview: The third volume of an inimitable and popular series, the ideal gift for cinema lovers: the most exciting Italian and non-Italian trailers in the history of cinema gathered in a phantasmagoric sarabande of immortal images, from "Amarcord" to "Ossessione", from "The Leopard" to "2001: A Space Odyssey", from "Night Effect" to "The Phantom of Liberty". The most beautiful films ever seen from the peephole of the trailers (those that in Italy were called 'coming soon') with unforgettable images of Fellini, De Sica, Kubrick, Bunuel, Visconti, Bergman, Leone and many others...
response.title: La notte dei trailer viventi 3
